attributes.action: Legalise the use, sale and production of "soft drugs"
attributes.background: In countries such as the Netherlands soft drugs such as cannabis hashish and hallucinogenic mushrooms are legal under the condition of personal use. If we legalised cannabis alone, up to £900m could be raised annually in taxes, according to the Institute for Economic Research.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what "soft drugs" are. If you want cannabis to be legalised, you might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/118978
